author: calderona
body:
#### PR description:

Some minor changes have been introduced in the range of some phase2 plots. 

#### PR validation:

Tested and all steps passed on samples: 

* 34650: ZMM No PU, 14TeV, D76 upgrade
* 34850 ZMM, PU, 14TeV, D76 upgrade
* 1330.0 ZMM, noPU, 13TeV standard 
* 136.867 RunSingleMu2018B, standard
title: RecoMuon Validation update for phase2
